name: AutoHotkey Operators
content:
; Valid assignment operators:
x := y
x += y
x -= y
x *= y
x /= y
x //= y
x .= y
x &= y
x ^= y
x >>= y
x <<= y
x |= y
x = y	 ;<<--- This one is iffy; also, it's no longer a valid assignment operator in AutoHotkey v2.0+

Other non-assignment operators:
x == y
x <> y
x != y
author: WSNHapps
